title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 5.1 - Introduction
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 5.1 - Introduction

State Regulations

Subdivision (4) of section
502
of
the Vehicle and Traffic Law provides that the applicant for an original
driver's license shall pass a vision test. Subdivision (6) of section
502
of
the Vehicle and Traffic Law provides that the Commissioner of Motor Vehicles
shall require each person holding a license issued pursuant to article 19 of
the Vehicle and Traffic Law to submit to a vision reexamination upon each
renewal of license to determine whether such person meets the minimum vision
standards. The minimum vision standards for the issuance of an original or
renewal driver license shall be the same. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
5.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
